backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access control, user profiles, equipment, assignments, issues, sessions, logs, and blob storage with admin/user permission checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing generated summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/docs/ANDROID_APK_GUIDE.md: Guide describing how to build an Android APK for the PWA using PWABuilder and required prerequisites.
frontend/docs/APK_BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Detailed instructions for generating a TWA-based Android APK via PWABuilder or Bubblewrap.
frontend/docs/APK_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Steps for deploying the Android APK, including PWA readiness and PWABuilder workflow.
frontend/docs/APK_DOWNLOAD_LINK.md: Guide explaining how to host and distribute the generated APK, including GitHub Releases.
frontend/docs/APK_QUICK_START.md: Quick-start instructions for creating an APK via PWABuilder in minutes.
frontend/docs/INCIDENT_REPORT.md: Incident report detailing credit overuse, build failures, scanner issues, and deployment problems for escalation.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML file configuring PWA metadata, asset preload, ZXing script loading, and auto-updating service worker registration.
frontend/index.ts: Snippet showing image data extraction and decodeFromImageData call for QR scanning.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Defines the PWA metadata, icons, shortcuts, screenshots, and share targets for Ramp Track.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a service worker handling caching, versioned asset management, and network-first fetch strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing authentication state, hash-based navigation, and reconnect overlay logic.
frontend/src/components/AuthDiagnosticsP: Empty placeholder file for an authentication diagnostics panel.
frontend/src/components/DemoLoginHandler: Empty placeholder file for demo login handling logic.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentQRScann: QR scanning component providing camera initialization, scanning UI overlays, and callback handling for login or equipment modes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Error boundary that displays a fallback screen, offers reload and cache-clear options, and can show diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login UI handling username/password entry, badge scanning, validation, and triggering AuthContext login.
frontend/src/components/NotFound.tsx: Displays a 404 page with a background image and a button that returns the user to the home page.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/PWAUpdateNotific: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/ReconnectingOver: Shows a reconnecting overlay with a spinner, delayed dismiss option, and fade animations during session refresh.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionScr: Presents role selection options and displays the current user’s name using the Auth context.
frontend/src/components/SignOnScreen.tsx: Displays agent/admin login options based on the user’s roles and redirects back if no user is provided.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Renders a splash screen with a background image and loading indicator.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Implements authentication context with session hydration, login handling, and localStorage-based persistence.
frontend/src/data/gates.ts: Exports a static readonly list of gate IDs with their coordinates and radius values.
frontend/src/data/userRoster.ts: Provides the full user roster used for authentication, including badge IDs, roles, and optional credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing AuthClient creation, identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for equipment, assignment, and issue operations using the actor, including authenticated mutations with user validation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light/dark theme variables, touch‑optimized styles, and rugged‑device UI adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/apiClient.ts: Implements a centralized API client handling auth tokens, query params, error handling, and structured responses for profile‑missing errors.
frontend/src/lib/auditLog.ts: Manages local audit log storage for scan events, including reading, writing, filtering, and user identity resolution from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/autoGateLocator.ts: Provides a Haversine-based nearest-gate detector returning a gate label within 120m or 'Out of area'.
frontend/src/lib/ensureUserContext.ts: Retrieves user context from localStorage with fallbacks and validates sessions without clearing local auth on backend errors.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentHistory.ts: Implements an in-memory log of equipment events with functions to add, query, and clear history.
frontend/src/lib/equipmentRegistry.ts: Manages equipment records with localStorage persistence, ID normalization, initialization, and required-equipment enforcement.
frontend/src/lib/parseBadge.ts: Extracts the longest digit sequence from scanner input as a badge ID, returning null if fewer than four digits.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing equipment, assignments, activity logs, and audit data with filters and update capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/CheckInScreen.tsx: Handles equipment check-in flow including QR scanning, ID normalization, status checks, GPS capture, and backend updates.
frontend/src/pages/CheckOutScreen.tsx: Checkout workflow that scans equipment QR codes, validates availability, captures GPS, and creates assignment records with activity logging.
frontend/src/pages/DEBUG_SAFE.tsx: Simple diagnostic page confirming the app booted.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentDetailScreen: Displays equipment details and history, with fallbacks if the ID is not found.
frontend/src/pages/ManageEquipmentScreen: Admin interface to view, search, add, and edit equipment records with validation and session checks.
frontend/src/pages/OperatorHomeScreen.ts: Home menu for operators to choose actions like taking, returning, or reporting issues with equipment.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupScreen.ts: Empty placeholder for future profile setup UI.
frontend/src/pages/RampControl.tsx: Empty placeholder for ramp control functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ReportIssueScreen.tsx: Issue reporting workflow that scans equipment, captures details and photos, logs activity, and updates equipment state.
frontend/src/pages/SignInScreen.tsx: React login screen handling operator/admin preset modes, credential input, and AuthContext login with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/types/zxing.d.ts: Type definitions for ZXing Browser API exposed on window, covering multi-format and QR code readers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata detailing current architecture, features, known issues, and versioned state for Ramp Track.
unknown.bash: Build script running pnpm build inside the frontend folder.
unknown.txt: Instructions for distributing, installing, updating, and troubleshooting the Android APK version of the app.
